trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Elizabeth
There were no other sightings in Elizabeth on or around September 24th 2011
divs: sighting detailswe were driving along highway 51 just south of elizabeth, pa at approximately 8:57 p.m on september 24, 2001. we noticed many (40+) orange orbs exactly as described in the below hyperlink. http:\\www.examiner.com\ufo-in-national\multiple-orange-lights-move-unison-over-pennsylvania we exited off hwy 51 at w. newton road where we were continued along rainbow run rd for approximately 1 mile until a clearly appeared. we stopped along side of the road where we were one of about 7 cars parked viewing the same thing. no one had a clue of what it could be. no sound. nothing. just orange orbs. once we stopped and watched for about 2 minutes, they moved in a horizontal direction. at this point we had only could view about 10 orbs with all the tree cover. after about 2 minutes that just disappeared. not much fading or anything. we then proceeded back towards the highway where we pulled off for about 5 minutes at the entrance ramp to hwy 51 off of rainbow run rd. from that vantage point after about the first 2 minutes about 5 orange orbs reappeared. they too disappeared after about 1 minute. again, after about another minute 2 more orange orbs reappeared for a third time. these two orbs were present for about 1 minute. they seemed to join into one light as they "fly" away. then they disappeared, never to reappear. i called the pittsburgh international airport to see what they had on radar, and they reported that the supervisor had nothing and no other reports. i also contacted the pittsburgh post gazette to report the story. they too had no other reports. to sum this up, just saw many (40+) orange orbs that appeared to hover until we got as close as you could were they then moved horizontally. they disappeared and reappeared 3 separate times. no explanation as to what it could be. most bizarre thing i have ever seen.
Summary: 40+ Orange orbs appeared hovering at a distance. Once we got closer they moved horizontal.
